## Checklist

<!-- For new translations -->
- [ ] I've read the [Translation Guide](docs/TRANSLATIONS.md)
- [ ] I've read the [Style Guide](docs/TRANSLATION_STYLE_GUIDE.md)
- [ ] I've checked the [STATUS.md](docs/LANG/STATUS.md) for my language
- [ ] All code blocks are unchanged
- [ ] Technical terms are consistent
